raw_comment:
1. I noticed that electricity generation has increased by about 5 million gigawatt hours in the past 20 years. Most notably in China, the total generation has increased by about 8 mill. in that country alone.
2. I wonder why the usage of coal had increased dramatically in China yet decreased in the United States.
3. This graph has a large impact on my future, in another 5-10 years the trend of this graph could have a huge place in the world around me.
4. Electricity Around the World: How Is It Changing?
ace_sentences: I noticed that electricity generation has increased by about 5 million gigawatt hours in the past 20 years.
In China, the total electricity generation has increased by about 8 million gigawatt hours in the past 20 years.
I wonder why the usage of coal increased dramatically in China.
I wonder why the usage of coal decreased in the United States.
This graph has a large impact on my future.
In 5 years, the trend of this graph could have a huge place in the world around me.
In 10 years, the trend of this graph could have a huge place in the world around me.
The headline is: Electricity Around the World: How Is It Changing?
